COPY
THE FLORIDA STATE UNIVERSITY
TALLAHASSEE 32306
UNIVERSITY BROADCASTING SERVICES
April 12, 1967
The Honorable George A, Smathers
Room 4313
Senate Office Building
Washington, D.C.
Dear Senator Smathers:
I appreciate your interest in sending me a copy of Senator Magnuson's
bill (S. 1160) concerning television and radio and the related materials*
We are of course extremely pleased that the proposed legislation does
Include radio as well as television in the language of the act. I, however,
am disappointed that a full step was not taken toward making this a Public
Broadcasting Act of 1967 rather than using television only in the title.
This is’"a small point but it is significant since it indicates a less than
full commitment to the potential of educational radio.
Perhaps before the legislation is enacted by the Senate such a change
could be made, I certainly would be grateful for your help in bringing it
about•
Thank you for your continued interest.
Sincerely yours.
(Mrs.) Marjorie Newman
Program Director, WFSU-FM
MN/je
